name: WarehouseReference
description: inventory-service reference to Warehouse entity contract

requiredFields.name: id
requiredFields.description: Warehouse unique identifier - always required when referencing a warehouse

requiredFields.name: code
requiredFields.description: Warehouse code - identity field used for display

usagePoints.purpose: Provides WarehouseId and WarehouseCode identity fields in inventory response

notes: inventory-service stores warehouseId as foreign key and resolves via Warehouse service API when DTOs need identity fields (code, name)
